verse: आलोड्य सर्वशास्त्राणि विचार्य च पुनः पुनः। इदमेकं सुनिष्पन्नं ध्येयो नारायणः हरिः॥

terms.ध्येयो: to be meditated upon or contemplated
terms.नारायणः: Narayana, another name for Lord Vishnu
terms.हरिः: Hari, another name for Lord Vishnu

meaning: Meaning: By thoroughly analyzing and reflecting upon all the scriptures, and repeatedly doing so, this one (Narayana/Hari) who is firmly established, should be contemplated upon. Narayana or Hari are names for Lord Vishnu, and the verse is suggesting that contemplation on him is essential after studying and reflecting on the scriptures.
